name: Storage 101
description: A neatly bundled straw bale made of large quantities of sun-dried grass, meticulously packed into compact, regular forms. It is said that most of the straw used across the tribes of Natlan originates from the Collective of Plenty. The straw is compressed and bound into a uniform "three-bundle" structure for ease of collection and bulk transport. However, due to its dense and highly flammable nature, improper handling can lead to spontaneous combustion. One must exercise extreme caution when stacking them up...
